column1: Sarah woke up an hour earlier every morning to practice her guitar before school.
Tom decided to read one new book every month to expand his knowledge.
After years of online streaming, Jenna finally mustered up the courage to apply for a cooking show.
Alex joined a weekend coding bootcamp to learn how to build mobile apps.
Emily set up a small herb garden on her balcony with hopes of becoming more self-sufficient.
Michael started taking evening classes to learn Spanish, aiming to be conversational by the end of the year.
Jenny signed up for a half-marathon and began running three times a week to prepare.
David hosted weekly game nights to practice his chess skills, dreaming of winning the local tournament.
Lisa started writing short stories, hoping one day to publish a collection of her works.
Kevin saved a portion of his allowance each week to buy a professional camera for his photography hobby.
Marie volunteered to lead the fundraiser at her child’s school, aiming to beat the previous year’s record.
Tom avoided fast food and cooked all his meals at home for a month to improve his diet.
Sophia put together a business plan to start her own Etsy shop selling handmade jewelry.
Nathan aimed to finish a jigsaw puzzle every week as a way of challenging himself.
Olivia decided to master a new recipe each month to enhance her culinary skills.
Eva began meditating daily to increase her focus and clarity for the upcoming exams.
Liam worked every weekend at the local café to save up for a trip to Europe.
Amy set up a blog to share her knitting patterns and connect with other enthusiasts.
Jason joined a study group to prepare thoroughly for his math exams and improve his grades.
Claire painted a new piece every week and shared her progress on social media, hoping to grow her following.
